data.expected_result: Same error toast as for regular voice call
data.short_description: (Android 6+) No error toast when attempting to start a video call without giving the app voice and camera permissions
data.steps_to_repro: - Revoke permissions from Discord to use microphone and camera - Go to a DM with someone - First, select "Start voice call". When Discord requests microphone access, an error toast will show up if you choose Refuse.  - Now do the same but with "Start video call" instead: when it requests access to camera/microphone choose Refuse
